originalText.text: Metropolitan College of New York (MCNY) is a private institution located in New York City. Founded in 1964, MCNY offers a range of undergraduate and graduate programs focused on preparing students for careers in business, education, human services, and public affairs. The college emphasizes experiential learning, community engagement, and social responsibility, providing students with practical skills and knowledge to succeed in their chosen fields. With a diverse student body and a commitment to serving non-traditional students, MCNY provides flexible scheduling options, including evening and weekend classes, to accommodate working professionals and adult learners. The college's urban campus is situated in the heart of Manhattan, offering students access to internships, networking opportunities, and cultural resources in one of the world's most dynamic cities.

originalText.text: Great private school, professors are helpful, offers a great variety of online courses, campus is beautifully designed and decorated, very inviting atmosphere. This picture is the silent room comfortably furnished right next to a very inviting lounge. As a student I very much enjoy studying here. The level of diversity is amazing, and everyone is helpful and kind.

originalText.text: MCNY is an exceptional college with knowledgeable faculty and staff. The school has a unique approach on how it caters to their students educational experience. I benefited from one on one sessions with my CA instructor who took time to understand me and listen to my ideas.  He offered guidance and openly shared his experiences with the class.  He wanted all of us to succeed but most importantly understood what it means to be a professional. He wanted us to understand that not matter the circumstances to continue learning and researching our fields.  He kindly reminded us how we can learn from everyone and to never stop being learners.

originalText.text: My experience at MCNY was a positive one, the assignments are geared towards the field that you are entering. I found that it was easy to work out a schedule for both work and school, The Professors and Instructors have work experience in the subject that they teach and the constructive Action assignments builds your strength and ability to produce independently the teaching method functions somewhat like a ladder, you are learning new subject on each step and it is built upon the step before, this way you can adsorb information at a comfortable pace.

originalText.text:
My MCNY journey was an exceptional one.  I attended the one year fast track MBA program.
It was indeed fast but thorough, complete and interesting.  The experiential learning component coupled with the International Travel portions were indeed the highlights of my experience.  All of the professors present a community feel as opposed to other environments wherein one would disappear in the abyss.  My co-hort was very close, we have maintained contact and continue to be resources and supporters of one another.  This was a total college experience and i highly recommend it.
